name: Imagine: Makeup Artist
storyline: In Imagine Makeup Artist, players begin as an apprentice and must work their way up to earn the reputation of a professional makeup artist. Players learn to apply makeup using proper techniques, create looks to match their clients' style requests and participate in contests. Use the stylus to apply makeup on game characters, including foundation, lipstick, eye shadow and blush. Play fun mini-games to earn money and go shopping for new makeup, clothes, hairstyles, accessories, and more!
summary:
Become an aspiring makeup artist! Start as an amateur and train yourself in different makeup techniques. Make your clients happy and beautiful by catering to their every need. Research the perfect looks, participate in contests, and build your reputation as a professional makeup artist!

This is the sequel to Cosmetic Paradise, which was only released in Europe for the English-speaking audience.
